sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
The GlideList Comparator is a custom Flow Designer action that compares two GlideList fields on a single record and identifies:
Items only in List A Items only in List B Items common to both lists
This is especially useful in scenarios like:
Comparing assigned vs. required skills Matching user groups vs. access groups Identifying mismatches in multi-reference fields
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: GlideList Comparator
